title: HOUR 2 - Right & wrong, rebuilding, Notre Dame
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Right & wrong, rebuilding, Notre Dame
description:
Where Colin was right and wrong

The Lions finally got their first win of the season

Teams in the NFL that are rebuilding

Marcus Freeman isn't being asked to rebuild Notre Dame



Guest: Marcus Freeman
